title: ‘If you lose like this then you can only be proud:’ Julie Van de Velde’s near miss
content:
The Belgian was a mere 150m away from the line when the sprinters denied her a stage win, but she won over the hearts of those watching

Read the full article at ‘If you lose like this then you can only be proud:’ Julie Van de Velde’s near miss on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
